title: Reading to Apply a Diagram
instructions: Read the following email message about the diagram. Complete the email by filling in the blanks. Select the best choice for each blank from the drop-down menu.

sections.content:
Subject: Jobs!
To: Albert <coolalbert101@canmail.ca>
From: Jim <jimscareercounselling@mailing.ca>

Hi Albert,

I hope this email finds you well.

I know that you've been going through a hard time lately, but now that you've graduated, it's time to start thinking seriously about your career. Both of these jobs will provide a good introduction to __DROPDOWN_1__. They also both entail __DROPDOWN_2__, which I think suits you.

The advantage of the first option is that it is __DROPDOWN_3__ position. This option's __DROPDOWN_4__ is also probably more to your liking. I know you want to get an apartment soon, so you would have to factor transportation costs in your decision-making.

However, the second one is probably a better option for you for now. It's close to the transit station, so it would be more convenient for commuting. Did you ever take any courses related to care for the elderly? Anyway, it sounds like that is __DROPDOWN_5__.

Regards,
Jim Wang

options: a bit pointless for this position
an asset rather than a necessity
a course you must take later on
